alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued December 25 at 8:02AM PST until December 25 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter of a mile or less in freezing fog. * WHERE...Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon. * WHEN...Until noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility and potential frost on bridges. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of dense freezing fog have developed this morning between Pendleton and the Washington border along Oregon state highway 11 with visibilities as low as a quarter mile from Pendleton to Milton-Freewater.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Also, be alert for frost on bridge decks causing slippery roads.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon
